author: Rebecca - Software Developer
testimonial: Dafnis is an immensely creative individual who is committed to his craft. He comes up with unique and creative ideas to any problem and really goes the extra mile.

author: Shalen - Entrepreneur
testimonial: Dafnis is someone who really takes note of what you are aspiring to achieve with your vision before he recreates an original piece that truly represents you. I have had the pleasure of working with Dafnis on four of my projects, both national and international, and his professionalism and efficient output was much appreciated. I can highly recommend his work. I know every upcoming project I have will be directed to Kowari Design.
